Announcements

  • Content title (2016-05-15)

    Urban tattoo RAF claymore mine table sensory woman pen assassin human nodality systema systemic convenience store. Chrome euro-pop-ware tanto RAF receding sentient Kowloon bridge shanty town grenade nodality car otaku augmented reality ablative crypto. Office hotdog 8-bit bomb receding car sensory.

Form

A basic form with text, email, and textarea

<form class="contact-form pure-form pure-form-stacked" action=/contact/ method="post">
	<input type='hidden' name='csrfmiddlewaretoken' value='HeV1pUx1x7vytz8rbqzt97kM9sMcKfzV' />
	<label for="id_name">Your name:</label>
	<input id="id_name" maxlength="100" name="name" type="text" />

	<label for="id_email">Your email address:</label>
	<input id="id_email" maxlength="200" name="email" type="email" />

	<label for="id_body">Your message:</label>
	<textarea cols="40" id="id_body" name="body" rows="10"></textarea>
	<button class="pure-button -submit" type="submit" value="Submit">Submit</button>
</form>

Login

Welcome

Collecting turtles...

Not a member? Register here 
<div class="login-section -fullwidth">
	<div class="container">
		<h1 class="title">Welcome</h1>

		<!-- form markup if html created manually

     <form class="login-form" action="post">
      <input type='hidden' name='csrfmiddlewaretoken' value='01cfjIeaBU3XYyAN9VNfy3CoxfChtmL6' />
      <label class="_visuallyhidden" for="login_username">Username</label>
      <input class="input" type="text" id="login_username" maxlength="254" name="username" placeholder="Username" required />
      <label class="_visuallyhidden" for="login_password">Password</label>
      <input class="input" type="password" id="login_password" name="password" placeholder="Password" required />
      <button class="button -submit" type="submit" name="submit">Sign In</button>
    </form>
 -->

		<!-- webapp template currently uses crispy form generated markup -->
		<form class="login-form" method="post">
			<input type="hidden" name="csrfmiddlewaretoken" value="HeV1pUx1x7vytz8rbqzt97kM9sMcKfzV">
			<div id="div_id_username" class="form-group">
				<div class="controls ">
					<input class="textinput textInput form-control" id="id_username" maxlength="254" name="username" placeholder="Username" type="text"> </div>
			</div>
			<div id="div_id_password" class="form-group">
				<div class="controls ">
					<input class="textinput textInput form-control" id="id_password" name="password" placeholder="Password" type="password"> </div>
			</div>
			<div class="form-actions">
				<input type="submit" name="submit" value="Sign In" class="btn btn-primary button -submit" id="submit-id-submit"> </div>
		</form>
		<!-- / crispy form markup -->
	</div>
	<h1 class="feedback">Collecting turtles...<span class="icon -loading"></span></h1>

	<a href="/kw/register/" class="link">Not a member? Register here</a>

	<ul class="floating-icons" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation">
		<li class="icon"><span class="icon-turtle"></span></li>
